Name: An Introduction to the Theory of the Boltzmann Equation (Dover Books on Physics)

ReviewList.Text: The book has an approach to the traditional physics by a statistical view. The solutions of the equations are obtained from classical theorems, as Hilbert and Freedolm. In this way the approach starts by the statistical mechanics for arriving to difficult questions about stochastics. So a theory sufficiently abstract provides some solutions for a real problems.
